sentences.sContent: More than 250 people at the church and 350 at the crematorium chapel.
sentences.sContent_eng: More than 250 people at the church and 350 at the crematorium chapel.
sentences.sCn: 教堂里有超过250人，火葬场的小礼堂里也有350多人。

sentences.sContent: Those that have already invested in heat-capture technology usually divert the excess heat to other crematorium buildings.
sentences.sContent_eng: Those that have already invested in heat-capture technology usually divert the excess heat to other crematorium buildings.
sentences.sCn: 那些已经花钱采用了热捕捉技术的火葬场，传输到别的火葬场。

sentences.sContent: He says plans to install heat-capture equipment at a crematorium in Cardiff provoked no hostility after staff took to the streets and explained how it works.
sentences.sContent_eng: He says plans to install heat-capture equipment at a crematorium in Cardiff provoked no hostility after staff took to the streets and explained how it works.
sentences.sCn: 他说, 在员工们走上街头向人们揭示其工作原理后，卡迪夫（Cardiff）火葬场安装热汲取设备的计划并没有激发敌意。

trans.tranOther: a building in which the bodies of dead people are burned at a funeral ceremony
